resources.string: Login with a Pokemon Trainer Club account

This is an UNOFFICIAL login to the Pokemon Go servers, so you can get the Pokemon data straight from the source

I recommend creating a dummy account to use with this app instead of your real account, in case scanning gets the account banned.

LOGIN AT YOUR OWN RISK
login failed. Go to Help on the toolbar for help with common login problems.
login failed. Your account may be banned.
account has not been activated. Please activate via the email they sent when you signed up.
Trying to login to Pokemon Go servers. This could take a while if the servers are overloaded.

string.name: createAccountMessage
string.a: Don\'t have an account? Create one!

resources.string: Are you sure you want to log out?

Make sure to enable Location Services for the best app experience.

WARNING: Be careful when using this app. Scanning could get your account banned, so use a dummy account for this app, or at least make the scans look believable.

The best way to get PokeSensor support or news is via Twitter @LogickLLC
Cannot detect Location Services. Please enable Location Services for the best experience.

You can adjust the scan radius, and PokeSensor will scan several sectors to fully cover it. Any Pokemon within the scan circle will reveal itself. Note that wider scans take longer time, as shown by the time estimate below.\n\nYou can also control your movement speed (i.e. how fast the scan moves from one sector to the next).
Scan your nearby area for Pokemon
Set the distance and time of your scan
Search for any location in the world to move to it

Made by Patrick Ballard (Logick LLC)
